Surcharges.Please, complete the parameter of the su: Please, fill the details of the new surcharge above to display the corresponding cost fields.
Surcharges.There is already the surcharge for these: It already exists a surchage for these dates. Do you want to created a new one or change the existing one?

Surcharges.this option will indicate that the char: this option indicated that this cost will be calculated by the chargeable weight (w/m) of the cargo

Surcharges.this cost will be calculated by the num: this cost will be calculated by the number of packages in the shipment
Surcharges.this means that the value indicated will: this cost will be billed once per shipment

Surcharges.Please_fields: Please, complete the freight parameters to display the corresponding fields of the rates.
Surcharges.Charge_15numbers: Value has to be equal or grater than zero, maximum 6 digits and two decimals.
Surcharges.There_freight: There are no freights and surcharges for these shipment dates. The offer won't be created until a matching offer is created.

Email notifications.Will alert_Sea: Will send you a notification a specific number of days before the Estimated Time of Arrival date of an import shipment (0 will be no notification).
Email notifications.Will alert_Export: Will alert you when an export shipment arrives to its destination.
Email notifications.Operation_Operation: Operation detail changes that are not updates to the departure or arrival dates of the shipment.
Email notifications.Number of days_Surcharge: Number of days to notify before a surcharge expires
Email notifications.Number of days_Freight: Number of days to notify before a freight rate expires
Email notifications.Will alert_Import: Will notify you when the departure date of an import shipment is set.

Landing Page.Acemaven_title1: Our solution optimizes the rate registration process for agents and the booking of shipments to the clients, supporting multiple shipping modes: FCL, LCL, Air and Ocean general cargo and ULD.
Landing Page.Acemaven_title2: The Acemaven platform is the digital connection for cargo transportation services between exporters and importers with the best freight forwarders in the country.
Landing Page.Acemaven_title3: Count with our tools to book and manage your operations: request changes, track shipments or post quotes if you can't find a rate.
Landing Page.Search and compare freight from local ag: State of the art user interface
Landing Page.FCL, LCL, Loose Cargo/RORO, Air Cargo mo: Any process takes less than 3 steps with a modern look and feel, detailed views of costs and operations and even more features coming soon.
Landing Page.See their position on the map and review: Follow up shipment milestones and aproximate location in our map once they have departed.
Stay in touch with the agent or request help from out team.
Landing Page.Compare the available offers based on co: Compare the available offers based on costs, transit time or prefered carrier.
Landing Page.description_freight_forwarder: Compare the available offers based on costs, transit time or prefered carrier. FCL, LCL, General Cargo, Air Freight and ULD modes available.
Landing Page.description_CBM_calculator: Add multiple cargo groups by types of packaging or containers, calculate w/m with precision, make shipment changes and more.
Landing Page.description_Air_shipping_mode: Acemaven's purpose is to modernize the freight forwarding market. Making digitally available the service of elite agents with an outstanding trajectory on demand, skipping commercial visits, back and forth message exchanges, slow quotes and allowing each part to focus in the essence of what unites us: moving cargo efficiently.
Landing Page.description_Marine_shipping_mode: With so much more to cover, expect more features in the near future. Sign up to get in touch with our team and know more about out platform and what It can do for you.
